microTiPi.microUtils

Class BlindDeconvJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • microTiPi.microUtils.BlindDeconvJob

  • public class BlindDeconvJob
extends java.lang.Object
    BlindDeconvJob is the solver for blind deconvolution
    Author:
    ferreol

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlindDeconvJob

        public BlindDeconvJob(int totalNbOfBlindDecLoop,
                      int[] parametersFlags,
                      int[] maxIter,
                      PSF_Estimation psfEstimation,
                      DeconvolutionJob deconvolver,
                      WeightUpdater wghtUpdt,
                      boolean debug)
        Build the solver for blind deconvolution
        Parameters:
        totalNbOfBlindDecLoop - number of loop
        parametersFlags - array of flags indicating which parameters of the MicroscopeModel will be estimated
        maxIter - number of iterations for each PSF sub-problems. It is has the same size as parametersFlags
        psfEstimation - solver for the PSF sub-problem. It contains the MicroscopeModel object that describes the PSF parameterization
        deconvolver - solver for the object sub-problem
        debug - debug flag
